title: The Birds and the Bees ...  and the bot
description:
A sex education chat bot answers questions from teens about sex and puberty.

Links to resources discussed:
Ask  Roo
Advocates for Youth
Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
